products.title: Infusion Solar Purple Pleated Skylight Blind
products.metadescription: Infusion solar purple pleated skylight blind in purple. Made to measure from 40.94 with free uk mainland delivery. This pleated skylight blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Their range of infusion solar pleated blinds is an excellent alternative to a venetian or roller blind. The solar feature means the blind will block sunlight and ultraviolet rays.  
 The infusion solar purple pleated skylight blind will transform the look of your home. Ideal for sloping windows, this beautiful blind is elegant and stylish. 
 
 Product id: db-pls0023 fabric colour: purple headrail: white rails and hardware with pull down tab and visible guide wires to support the blind fabric.   Control type: pull down tab - 100cm reach rod available at extra cost energy saving rating: er3 - highest energy saving value - uv protection and effective thermal retention light filtering: yes

products.title: Dark Purple (4561) (Blackout)

products.productdescription:
The velux blackout blind offers light proof seal for total darkness anytime. It is ideal in bedrooms, where you need complete light control to ensure a good nights sleep or restful nap during the day.

 	Total blackout - best on the market.
 	Oeko-tex certified.
